General.Name: Alarko Carrier Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Alarko Carrier Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells products and services in the areas of heating, cooling, air-conditioning, and water pressurization. The company offers various heating systems, including combi boilers, boilers, burners, heat pumps, solar thermal collectors; and auxiliary equipment, such as hot water storage tanks, radiators, radiator valves, unit heaters, expansion tanks, plate exchangers, balance tanks, control units, and air curtains, as well as boiler combi room thermostat and other combi boiler accessories. It also provides cooling systems comprising residential, multi, and commercial air conditioners; air purifiers; VRF systems; air handling units; packaged roof units; liquid chillers; laminar flow units; close control air conditioners; fancoil units; humidifiers; cold room refrigeration units; and cooling accessories. In addition, the company offers water pressurization systems, such as submersible pumps and motors, water boosters, and centrifugal and circulation pumps; and engineering services consisting of building management systems, energy efficiency consultancy, and after sales services. Alarko Carrier Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Gebze, Turkey. Alarko Carrier Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Carrier Global Corporation.
General.Address: GOSB - Gebze Organize Sanayi BOelgesi, Gebze, Turkey, 41480
